      • secretListing

        @Timed
 @ExceptionMetered
 @GET
 @Produces(value="application/json")
public Iterable<String> secretListing(@Auth
                                                                                                           AutomationClient automationClient,
                                                                                                           @QueryParam(value="idx")
                                                                                                           Integer idx,
                                                                                                           @QueryParam(value="num")
                                                                                                           Integer num,
                                                                                                           @DefaultValue(value="true") @QueryParam(value="newestFirst")
                                                                                                           boolean newestFirst)
        Retrieve listing of secret names. If "idx" and "num" are both provided, retrieve "num" names starting at "idx" from a list of secret names ordered by creation date, with order depending on "newestFirst" (which defaults to "true")
        Parameters:
        idx - the index from which to start retrieval in the list of secret names
        num - the number of names to retrieve
        newestFirst - whether to list the most-recently-created names first

public Iterable<SanitizedSecret> secretListingV2(@Auth

                                                                                                                                          @DefaultValue(value="true") @QueryParam(value="newestFirst")
                                                                                                                                          boolean newestFirst)
        Retrieve listing of secrets. If "idx" and "num" are both provided, retrieve "num" names starting at "idx" from a list of secrets ordered by creation date, with order depending on "newestFirst" (which defaults to "true")
        Parameters:
        idx - the index from which to start retrieval in the list of secrets
        num - the number of names to retrieve
        newestFirst - whether to list the most-recently-created names first

      • secretContents

        @Timed
 @ExceptionMetered
 @POST
 @Path(value="request/contents")
 @Produces(value="application/json")
public SecretContentsResponseV2 secretContents(@Auth
                                                                                                                                                      AutomationClient automationClient,
                                                                                                                                                      SecretContentsRequestV2 request)
        Retrieve contents for a set of secret series. Throws an exception for unexpected errors (i. e. empty secret names or errors connecting to the database); returns a response containing the contents of found secrets and a list of any missing secrets.

      • secretVersions

        @Timed
 @ExceptionMetered
 @GET
 @Path(value="{name}/versions")
 @Produces(value="application/json")
public Iterable<SecretDetailResponseV2> secretVersions(@Auth
                                                                                                                                                            AutomationClient automationClient,
                                                                                                                                                            @PathParam(value="name")
                                                                                                                                                            String name,
                                                                                                                                                            @QueryParam(value="versionIdx")
                                                                                                                                                            int versionIdx,
                                                                                                                                                            @QueryParam(value="numVersions")
                                                                                                                                                            int numVersions)
        Retrieve the given range of versions of this secret, sorted from newest to oldest update time. If versionIdx is nonzero, then numVersions versions, starting from versionIdx in the list and increasing in index, will be returned (set numVersions to a very large number to retrieve all versions). For instance, versionIdx = 5 and numVersions = 10 will retrieve entries at indices 5 through 14.
        Parameters:
        name - Secret series name
        versionIdx - The index in the list of versions of the first version to retrieve
        numVersions - The number of versions to retrieve

        @Timed
 @ExceptionMetered
 @Path(value="{name}/setversion")
 @POST
public javax.ws.rs.core.Response resetSecretVersion(@Auth
                                                                                                                       AutomationClient automationClient,
                                                                                                                       SetSecretVersionRequestV2 request)
        Reset the current version of the given secret to the given version index.
        Parameters:
        request - A request to update a given secret
